     # File lib/localization_simplified.rb, line 198
198:   def to_sentence(options = {})
199:     #Blend default options with sent through options
200:     options.reverse_merge!(LocalizationSimplified::ArrayHelper::ToSentenceTexts)
201: 
202:     # added two option for asian usage, :comma to replace "," and :remove_space (true or false) to remove the space after connector
203:     options.assert_valid_keys(:connector, :skip_last_comma, :comma, :remove_space)
204:     options.reverse_merge! :connector => 'and', :skip_last_comma => false, :comma => ', ', :remove_space => false
205: 
206:     space = options[:remove_space] ? '' : ' '
207:     connector = space + options[:connector] + space
208:     case length
209:      when 0
210:        ""
211:      when 1
212:        self[0]
213:      when 2
214:        "#{self[0]}#{connector}#{self[1]}"
215:      else
216:        "#{self[0...-1].join(options[:comma])}#{options[:skip_last_comma] ? '' : ','}#{connector}#{self[-1]}"
217:     end
218:   end
